mapper.select: SELECT b.*, p.is_popup FROM (SELECT article_no ,article_title ,to_char(start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') start_date ,to_char(terminate_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') terminate_date FROM tb_board2 WHERE board_no = 6 AND is_delete = 0 AND to_char(terminate_date,'YYYY-MM-DD')>=to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')) b INNER JOIN tb_popup2 p ON p.article_no = b.article_no WHERE is_popup=#{is_popup}
